description: Same vendor submits valuation request twice within 24 hours
issue_detected: Duplicate detected: same email + address in CRM
final_outcome: Lead deduplicated - original record updated with new timestamp
demo_talking_points: AI prevents duplicate records cluttering CRM

description: Buyer enquiry missing phone number and budget
issue_detected: Missing fields: phone and budget
final_outcome: Email sent asking buyer to provide contact number and budget range
demo_talking_points: AI knows what's missing and asks politely

description: Property EPC expired - cannot proceed with valuation
issue_detected: EPC expiry: 2025-01-20 - expires in 54 days
final_outcome: Alert sent to vendor: EPC renewal needed before marketing
demo_talking_points: Compliance issues caught early not at launch

description: Rural property with no recent comparable sales nearby
issue_detected: Only 1 comparable found within 2 miles in 12 months
resolution_action: Widen search radius + use price-per-sqft method
final_outcome: CMA generated using alternative methodology with confidence note
demo_talking_points: AI adapts methodology when data is sparse

description: Vendor identified as Politically Exposed Person
issue_detected: PEP check: FLAGGED - Lord Edward Blackwood
final_outcome: EDD process initiated - manual compliance review required

description: Instruction signed but property found on competitor portal
issue_detected: Property found active on PurpleBricks listing
final_outcome: Workflow paused - negotiator to clarify with vendor

description: Property photos too dark/blurry for portal standards
issue_detected: 3 of 12 photos below quality threshold (resolution/lighting)
final_outcome: Launch blocked - photographer rebooking requested
demo_talking_points: Quality gates prevent poor listings going live

description: Property ready to launch but floorplan not uploaded
issue_detected: Floorplan: MISSING - required for Rightmove premium
final_outcome: Launched on Zoopla/OTM - Rightmove delayed pending floorplan

description: Buyer registered budget doesn't match enquiry property
issue_detected: Budget £210k but enquiring on £650k property
final_outcome: Response sent asking if budget has changed or if error

description: 15 buyers want same viewing slot
issue_detected: 15 requests for Saturday 10am slot - max capacity 6
resolution_action: Prioritize by buyer score and create waitlist
final_outcome: Top 6 booked by match score - 9 offered alternative slots

description: Two viewings accidentally booked same time
issue_detected: Conflict: BUY-3011 and BUY-3019 both 2pm Saturday
resolution_action: Detect conflict and reschedule lower priority
final_outcome: Higher-scored buyer keeps slot - other offered 2:30pm

description: Vendor suddenly unavailable for confirmed viewings
issue_detected: Vendor called: family emergency - cancel all viewings today
final_outcome: 5 buyers notified with new date options - sympathy tone

description: Two buyers give opposite feedback on same feature
issue_detected: Buyer A: garden too small | Buyer B: garden perfect size
resolution_action: Flag as subjective - no action needed
final_outcome: Report notes: garden size subjective - vendor informed
demo_talking_points: AI distinguishes objective issues from personal taste

description: Feedback suggests price 20%+ below comparable sales
issue_detected: 5 buyers said: bargain price! | Comps show £240k avg
final_outcome: Negotiator alerted - recommend vendor discussion before accepting offers

description: New higher offer received after sale agreed
issue_detected: New offer £295k received - existing agreed £290k
resolution_action: Flag ethical issue - vendor decision required
final_outcome: Vendor informed of new offer - decision documented either way

description: Bank statement shows less than offered amount
issue_detected: Offer: £550k | Bank statement shows: £485k
final_outcome: Buyer asked to explain gap or provide additional proof
demo_talking_points: Catches financial discrepancies before they cause problems

description: Buyer's solicitor uncontactable for 7+ days
issue_detected: No response from solicitor: 4 emails + 2 calls over 7 days
resolution_action: Flag as risk - recommend buyer escalation
final_outcome: Alert sent to buyer: please contact your solicitor urgently

description: One party in chain sale just fell through
issue_detected: Buyer's buyer (end of chain) sale collapsed
final_outcome: Alert: chain break risk - backup buyer search initiated
demo_talking_points: AI responds to chain problems instantly

description: Solicitor raises new enquiry day before exchange
issue_detected: New enquiry: boundary dispute question raised at 4pm
final_outcome: Emergency call scheduled for 9am - exchange postponed 48hrs

description: Completion day - funds not received by 2pm
issue_detected: Expected 10am - still not received 2pm - CHAPS cutoff 3:30pm
final_outcome: Emergency chase initiated - funds arrived 2:45pm - completed
